name: SpaceDucks: Resurrection
description:
Dodge asteroids and shoot naughty monsters as you navigate the dangers of interplanetary space in a bid to resurrect the inhabitants of nearby planets.

Controls:

Thrust - Space

Movement Direction - Mouse Cursor

Shoot - Left Click

Pause - Escape

Entry for JameGam: Easter Edition

Made in 4 days, by one person, using Unity, Aseprite, Audacity and Bfxr.

Theme: Resurrection; Special Object: Egg

https://itch.io/jam/jame-gam-easter-edition
